attributes.action: instruct all those MPs of all colours who are resisting the refunding of overclaimed expenses to put up or shut up.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If these parasites are not happy with the decision of the official investigator then they should resign their seats and ask their electorate to indicate if they support their claims for expenses by re-electing them.  Any individual who is re-elected to his or her seat should be able to then say "I don't need to pay anything back because my voters believe, like me, I did nothing wrong."  If they are, however, not re-elected then they will be taken to court by lawyers supported by taxpayers like me with donations of thousands of pounds to get them put in jail for a very long time, for fraud!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
